directions: In a small bowl, mix together salad dressing, milk, sugar, vinegar, and poppy seeds.  Refrigerate until ready to use.
Combine lettuce, onion, strawberries, pecans, and red bell pepper in a salad bowl.  Toss with dressing.
ingredients: 1/2 cup fat-free creamy salad dressing (ie: Fat Free Miracle Whip TM)
1 head romaine lettuce, torn into bite-size pieces
title: Strawberry Salad I
